text: Herbert Magnus Johnson (2 November 1879 – 20 October 1942) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Herb Johnson's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1879 births Category:1942 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Herb Johnson (footballer)
